title.rendered: How I Would Hack You: Confessions of an Ethical Hacker

content.rendered:
Confessions of an Ethical Hacker

Ever wonder how cyber criminals might attack and cripple your business? Well, join us for this informative webinar to learn how a penetration tester would attempt to hack and breach your company’s defenses. If you are not familiar with “pen-testers,” they are hired by organizations to proactively probe their cybersecurity defenses and discover holes or vulnerabilities.

In this short webinar, ethical hacker and professional pen-tester, James Carroll, will reveal the most common weaknesses in most small businesses and how he would exploit them. He will also discuss why so many small businesses are frequent cyber security victims and what you can do about it.

You’ll learn:

• The five most common vulnerabilities in most small businesses

• How pen-testers work with their clients to test defenses and discover weaknesses

• Why employees are sometimes the weakest link in your cybersecurity defenses

• What proactive cybersecurity steps you can take as a business leader

About Our Speaker: James Carroll is founder and principal at Hacket Cyber. He is a professionally trained ethical hacker and penetration tester. When not hacking his clients’ networks, Carroll is a frequent speaker and trainer cybersecurity industry events. He also speaks frequently at industry events with non-technical senior management and leaders.

Looking for more educational content? Check out our Resources Center for more! https://www.snaptechit.com/resources/
